entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain. Rain mixed with snow this evening. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections overnight. Wind becoming west 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 7:40 PM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Showers. Temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon.

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
